channel.title: I have alot of questions
channel.description:
ok, so earlier i only played a dif server, and iwas friends with the owner and i looked stuff up over here so i cud help some times, anyways, the server closed...R.I.P. and now i'm gonna probably make my own server with some friends, i'm gonna be the hoster and coder, so i need a little help,
1.once i have no-ip., i picked what i'll base my servre off of, now how do i make it so that when i log into my ip, it goesinto the server i want? i mean, where do i code in thefiles, what ip i'm using, idk if i asked it right, but if u understandthnpls reply.
2.is it possible to add another rank? i meani asked this beffore but didnt really get an answer. becuase right now there is 0-3, player,mod,admin,owner. and i wanted to make it so there is : player,donater,mod,admin,owner. just so donaers could get crowns, or maybe just make therank for close friends.
3.how do i make a donation thing? lol. i mean,i have a paypal acc, now what? i post the info on my forums, and then how do i know who donated? how do i make sure that the real donater gets the rank?
4.what do u guys recomend? should i host a 317 or 508, people always tell me that 508s suck, their bugged, they lagg. i personnally wanted to host a 508, but i heard that 317s are easierto code n' all.
i have more questions that i will ask/post later on, and thank you for our cooperation :)

item.title: I have alot of questions
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

ok, thnx,
but that still leavs me with 3 unanswered questions T.T

Read full topic

item.title: I have alot of questions
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

im not answering on all but one number 4.

317 is definetly the best to code and host becuz its less laggy and more stabile than a 508 witch has alot off glitches and lags and are more unstabile

Read full topic
